description: This file defines a React component for an instructor's assessment management page, including creating assessments, listing assessments, and reviewing submissions with AI feedback features.

methods.name: CreateAssessmentModal
methods.description: React component for creating new assessments (assignments or quizzes) with form inputs and submission handling.

methods.name: InstructorAssessmentsPage
methods.description: Main React component for displaying and managing assessments, including listing, filtering, creating, and reviewing submissions with AI feedback.
